adv: Recommendations sometimes made it easy to discover another relevant variable by browsing.
disadv: I was unable to control/predict what would be on the X/Y/shape/color variables.  Sometimes I wanted to see specific configurations and it would pick another.  This was frustrating.
comment: The legends for quantitative values on shape are incorrect.  They show circles of increasing SIZE while the actual interface is doing something else. Maybe fill, but sometimes there was one circle inside of another...so I'm really not sure.
